title: +140 से शुरू होने वाली कॉल उठाने से बैंक बैलेंस 0 हो सकता है? मुंबई पुलिस का वीडियो वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
[ट्वीट किया गया मेसेज: “@MumbaiPolice got this video on whatsapp informing not to pick up call from phone number starting with 140. This seems to be during covid pandemic as police is wearing a mask. Can you please confirm the authenticity of this news?”]

Mumbai Police Main Control has just received a message that call numbers starting with 140 should not be accepted.

 Forward this information to all groups, even if it is a public group.

 👇👇👇
